name: EvaMariaBot
description: When you going to send file on telegram channel this bot will save that in database, So you can search that easily in inline mode

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. This is bot database group/channel if you want to add multiple databases then Separate multiple IDs by space. make sure bot is admin in your group/channel. Give a channel id use private channel (recommended)

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admins which have access to Bot's all commands. Separate multiple Admins by space.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures get this value from @hk_telegraph_bot on Telegram. If you want to add multiple images then Separate links by space bot will share a random image on /start.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs, where bot will share his activies like new user joined, batch json file created etc. Give a channel id use private channel (recommended)

AUTH_USERS.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of that channel which you want to force subscribe by your user. Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

DATABASE_URI.description: mongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in mongoDB. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: Default is https://github.com/hagadmansa/EvaMaria. without this your bot will not work. Do not change if you don't know python.
